Bibliography

course bibliography and references for COMP 125

The course bibliography & references will be updated on a weekly basis with suggested reading, which will reflect each week’s course notes.

Where applicable, references will be cited at the end of each week’s notes.

There is no specific textbook for this course.

Course bibliography will be updated during the semester.

Week 5
  • W3Schools - HTML
    • <body>
    • Form Attributes
    • Form Elements
    • images
    • links
    • lists
    • tables
Week 4
  • Jaffe, Jim., Application Foundations For The Open Web Platform. W3C. 10.14.2014. http://www.w3.org/blog/2014/10/application-foundations-for-the-open-web-platform/
  • W3C Documentation - HTML Syntax
  • MDN - JS
    • working with objects
  • W3Schools - JS
    • HTML DOM
    • objects and properties
Week 3
  • MDN - JS
    • array
    • JavaScript data types and data structure
    • strings reference
  • W3Schools - JS
    • arrays
    • strings
Week 2
  • W3Schools - JS
    • arithmetic
    • data types
    • operators
    • variables
Week 1
  • MDN - What is JavaScript?
